items.title: Amgen: Blockbusters, Emerging Therapies, And Investment Potential
items.description: Amgen has a strong product portfolio, pipeline developments, and robust financial health. Read why AMGN stock is a Strong Buy for long-term investors.

items.title: Amgen: Strong Fundamentals But Expensive Valuation Justifies A Hold
items.description: Article analyzes Amgen's strong clinical progress and financials, recommending caution due to valuation and technical indicators.

items.title: Prediction: These 3 Healthcare Stocks Will Soar in 2025
items.description: Here's why they chose Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN), Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY), and Summit Therapeutics (NASDAQ: SMMT).  David Jagielski (Amgen): Shares of Amgen started crashing in late November following the release of data from a phase 2 clinical trial for its weight loss candidate, MariTide.
